summary: MANUFACTURING RECALL  P020449-S ISSUED ON JANUARY 23, 2003, HOWEVER THE CONSUMER RECEIVED THE RECALL THE FIRST WEEK OF FEBRUARY. THE REPAIRS WERE MADE BY AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC REGARDING THE STEERING RACK AND PINION AND ALSO THE POWER STEERING PUMP, THE CONSUMER REQUESTED REIMBURSEMENT. *AK   *JB *TS
